item.title: About Xiaozhe Yao
item.description: Xiaozhe Yao (姚晓哲) Xiaozhe Yao is a first-year doctoral student at DS3Lab, Systems Group, Department of Computer Science, ETH Zurich. With interests spanning from machine learning systems to self-learning databases, his long-term goal is to make machine learning automatic and accessible. He is an enginner, and he builds possibly cool stuff. Prior to ETH Zurich, Xiaozhe Yao gained his Master’s degree at the University of Zurich in Data Science and Bachelor’s degree at Shenzhen University in Computer Science.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: askxzyao@gmail.com Social GitHub Twitter LinkedIn Flickr

item.title: Fun Facts
item.description: Interests I love travelling, meeting new people and taking pictures. Please consider following my Flickr. I am a donor to open knowledge and open software, specifically Wikipedia and FSF. If you share the same passion, please consider donating with my referral link: FSF.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Active Projects SHiFT - Search Engine for Machine Learning. Data-Centric vision Benchmark for Training Data Debugging. Datasets Crosstalk Dataset. Covid-19 Twitter Dataset. Open Source Community Analytical Dataset Past (inactive) Projects Foodie: Comprehensive Food Recommendation. Tinynet: Implement Neural Network From Scratch. Covid-Sentiment: Analyse People’s Response to Covid-19 from Tweets. Demo Industry AI: Online Annotation for Image Datasets. AID - One Stop Machine Learning Model Management System. EurusDB.
